title: Cardiogram
description:
Cardiogram: Heart IQ is a heart rate monitor and symptom tracker that helps you detect and manage health conditions like POTS or atrial fibrillation, using minute-by-minute heart rate information collected by your smartwatch. We provide a health report card score that is updated weekly and risk scores for hypertension, sleep apnea, and diabetes so you can follow your progress for preventing or managing these conditions. Interactive, color-coded charts let you pinch-to-zoom into detailed heart rate data, step counts, time-stamped symptoms, medications, and logged blood pressure measurements. Cardiogram allows you to see the connection between your symptoms, how you’re feeling and heart rate information you can share with your doctor. You can also set heart rate alerts for high and low readings and connect a family member so they can see your data.

Cardiogram: Migraine IQ helps you understand what’s going on in your body when you have migraines. If you complete your daily log, we will use your individual data to tell you how likely you are to have a migraine in the next 48 hours. This allows you to take steps to end your migraine before it begins!

Compatible smartwatches include: wear OS, Samsung Galaxy, Fitbit, and Garmin. 

We take your privacy seriously. We use healthcare-grade encryption and we never sell your data.

Cardiogram: Heart IQ Features
	•	Digital diary of your heart rate data. View changes on interactive, heart rate timeline graph.
	•	Log symptoms and activities to correlate with heart rate changes.
	•	Follow trends in smart metrics.
	•	Join habits to manage and prevent health conditions like high blood pressure, sleep apnea, and diabetes.
	•	You can log your blood pressure manually.
	•	Keep track of your medications in a daily medication log.
	•	Add notes or journal entries to help determine what may have caused a spike or dip in your heart rate.
	•	Share your information in a concise, objective report with all the information your healthcare provider needs to assist in diagnosis and treatment decisions.

Cardiogram: Migraine IQ Features
	•	Track location and pain severity of your migraine.
	•	Answer daily log questions to find out the likelihood of a migraine in the next 48 hours.
	•	Track habits, triggers, and symptoms.
	•	View location heat maps of past migraines.
	•	Log medication taken to prevent or manage migraine.
	•	Share information with your doctor in a concise, objective report.

Cardiogram has been downloaded by over 10 million users in more than 100 countries.
Cardiogram is a subscription app with a 30-day Free Trial for new users. Our free version has limited functionality with an opportunity to upgrade.

Subscribe to either Heart IQ, Migraine IQ, or both.
